info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 01 at 9:58PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Areas of fog developing across portions of the lower to middle Rio Grande Valley tonight... Surface observations and satellite images indicate areas of fog are developing across portions of the lower and middle Rio Grande Valley tonight. Fog will continue to develop across the area overnight as clear skies and light winds allow the fog to continue to develop. Visibilities will be reduced to 1 to 3 miles in general. If the fog becomes widespread and visibilities drop to a quarter of a mile or less overnight...a Dense Fog Advisory will be needed for portions of the Rio Grande Valley later tonight. Motorists are urged to reduce speed...use low beam headlights...and avoid following other vehicles too closely in areas of locally dense fog.
